meta.content: Polaris Charter School is a public elementary school with a project-based curriculum, located in Manchester, NH. Any family with a child between the ages of 6 and 11, living in New Hampshire that is seeking a way for their child to be inspired to learn, in a way that works for and enables her/him to reach their full
Polaris Charter School | Public Elementary School | NH, USA

Polaris Charter School is a public elementary school with a project-based curriculum, located in Manchester, NH. Any family with a child between the ages of 6 and 11, living in New Hampshire that is seeking a way for their child to be inspired to learn, in a way that works for and enables her/him to reach their full

h5.span: Our next School Board of Trustees meeting will take place April 9th at 3:00pm. This meeting will be held using ZOOM to comply with Governor Sununu’s guidelines due to Covid-19. This meeting will be open to the public to attend at the school, where social distancing and attendance guidelines will be observed.

div.style: border-width:0 0 0 0;border-style:solid solid solid solid;border-color:rgba(176, 169, 134, 1) rgba(176, 169, 134, 1) rgba(176, 169, 134, 1) rgba(176, 169, 134, 1);border-radius:0 0 0 0;box-shadow:0 4px 10px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);overflow:hidden;transform:translateZ(0);position:relative;height:100%;width:100%;margin:-0px

p.span: Admissions for the upcoming year begin in November. Be sure to read about our admissions process to know the steps to help your child join our school.

div.style: border-width:0 0 0 0;border-style:solid solid solid solid;border-color:rgba(176, 169, 134, 1) rgba(176, 169, 134, 1) rgba(176, 169, 134, 1) rgba(176, 169, 134, 1);border-radius:0 0 0 0;box-shadow:0 4px 10px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);overflow:hidden;transform:translateZ(0);position:relative;height:100%;width:100%;margin:-0px

p.span: Get quick access to our school year calendar. Parents, while the calendar is subject to change, you can always find the most up-to-date version on our website.

div.style: border-width:0 0 0 0;border-style:solid solid solid solid;border-color:rgba(176, 169, 134, 1) rgba(176, 169, 134, 1) rgba(176, 169, 134, 1) rgba(176, 169, 134, 1);border-radius:0 0 0 0;box-shadow:0 4px 10px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);overflow:hidden;transform:translateZ(0);position:relative;height:100%;width:100%;margin:-0px

span.span: #2 Best Charter Elementary Schools in NH

p.span: . According to state test scores, 65% of students are at least proficient in math and 65% in reading.

span.span: Polaris Charter School admits students of any race, color, national origin, ethnic origin to all the right, privileges, programs, and activities accorded or made available to students at the school. It does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, and ethnic origin in the administration of its educational policies, administration policies, scholarship and loan programs, and athletic and other school-administered programs.
